name: ARPB_TX_MODIFIERS
description: This table contains multiple response information for modifiers associated with A/R (ETR) transactions.

columns.name: ETR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transaction (ETR) record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_MODIFIER
columns.description: The external ID of the modifier record.
